title: Afk buff?
body:
This might be a bad idea but I think when someone leaves, the team should get an Afk buff or something so it won't be as unfair.
Maybe a buff that scales with level so it won't be OP, and make it that when someone leaves, there's a timer until you can get it, so someone cant just leave and the team gets it insistently, but, if the person that left reconnects, the buff will be gone.

replies.body: its already in game  they are pretty much impossible to kill

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lmyzEYAk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-18T07:27:28.574+0000)
>
> its already in game  they are pretty much impossible to kill

I think he means a buff that affects the team, like an increase in gpm, or a buff similar to baron to counteract the loss of the player.
Yea, pretty much. Because right now you can't see the buff (Above hud). And also, if it's already in the game, what does it do? Just wondering.
And if this is already in the game, then just tell me :P

Right now there's no buff that actually helps the team if someone leaves. The only thing implemented is the dc/leaver gains 1k mr and armour to prevent them from dying to stuff like Karth ults/ other globals.
